description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Dorset, United Kingdom. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Charming Dorset Georgian Manor Escape along Jurassic Coast with Daily Breakfast & Tranquil Spa
hotels.description: Step back in time and discover the timeless charm of England's UNESCO World Heritage-listed Jurassic Coast with a stay at Moonfleet Manor. The generously restored Georgian homestead overlooking shingled Chesil Beach in Dorset offers a blend of old-world elegance and modern comfort. Relish refined dishes at the onsite restaurant, find refreshment at the indoor pool and day spa or just sit back and soak up jaw-dropping vistas over the English Channel.

seo.title: Hoteles en Dorset - United Kingdom Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Dorset, United Kingdom con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
